Text: How do you play the multiple .rar files when it has downloaded? this probably is such a stupid question but i dont know how to do it? it downloads into its directory but there are 27 rar files and how do i use  open them to watch the programme?

Download a program called Winrar and open the first file *.01 or *.rar if there is one  then exctract the file.  Some media player can play the file whitout exctrackt the file (XBMC does it, but that player if for the xbox)

yes it is a stupid questions but thats all right. :-)
